==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 12===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
** For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
** No Ley Line Disorder.
* '''Additional Effects'''
** In Chamber 2's First Half, the Fatui Electro Cicin Mage is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura that periodically spawns a {{Color|Electro|Lightning Stake}}.
** In Chamber 2's Second Half, one of the Fatui Pyro Agents is empowered with a {{Pyro}} Aura that periodically spawns a {{Color|Pyro|Pursuing Fireball}}.
** In Chamber 3's First Half, one of the Ruin Guards is empowered with a {{Geo}} Aura that periodically spawns {{Color|Geo|Rumbling Stone}}.
** In Chamber 3's Second Half, one of the Ruin Graders is empowered with a {{Cryo}} Aura that periodically spawns an {{Color|Cryo|Ice Cage}}.
